title: Something Has To Change Or Else You'll Stay Like Everyone Else Forever (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Ken Coleman discuss:

How to manage retirement savings with a 403(b),

Best way to set up student loans in your debt snowball,

How to find margin in your budget for childcare,

Living minimally to have the maximum impact on your debt,

Dave's results to Ken's "Get Clear Assessment" and why this assessment is so accurate and impactful.


Support Our Sponsor:

Zander Insurance

Grip6

PODS Moving & Storage
